snippet: Unjust disparities in pay have an insidious ripple effect.
abstract: Editorial stresses importance, both in terms of fairness and economics, of closing wage gap between men and women; notes women are primary breadwinners in more than 60 percent of American families; calls for passage of Paycheck Fairness Act, which has been repeatedly blocked by Congressional Republicans, that Senate Democrats are bringing to floor again; holds while bill is unlikely to pass, forcing Republicans to publicly register another rejection will resonate with voters.
lead_paragraph: Unjust disparities in pay have an insidious ripple effect.

headline.main: A Showdown on the Pay Gap
headline.print_headline: A Showdown on the Pay Gap
